description:
Kiriku is first introduced as an enigmatic new teacher to the Kazalm academy.
It is later revealed that he is in fact working under orders from Duke Damiya himself, and is assigned to work undercover in Kazalm.
He seems well versed in the art of poisonmaking, and is shown to use these ill skills assasinating the enemies of the Duke.
He first sees Erin as a potential weapon, but later wants to protect her because she resembles his dead sister.
name: Kiriku
